hadiths.text: Narrated Aisha, Ummul Mu'minin: The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) was using the tooth-stick, when two men, one older than the other, were with him. A revelation came to him about the merit of using the tooth-stick. He was asked to show proper respect and give it to the elder of the two

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الرَّجُلِ يَسْتَاكُ بِسِوَاكِ غَيْرِهِ
